name: Hunger Fangs
description:
This game was made for the "My First Game Jam: Summer 2022" game jam with the theme of "Heal".

Run, Jump, Dash and Kill in this speedrunning platformer as a hungry vampire who must eat before he starves.

Programming: ChunkyPotatoSoup

Pixel Art: 13throbot

Music/Sounds:  TETRIS/@T_up_2

Main Character Design: Aneubys

Hunger Fangs OST: https://soundcloud.com/tup2-125912268/sets/hunger-fangs-ost?utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
